DOC.detailed_description: We design randomize study investigate clinical benefit neoadjuvant chemotherapy bulky stage I/II cervical cancer . Patients FIGO stage I/II bulky disease randomize either neoadjuvant chemotherapy ( BOMP : Cisplatin 14mg/m2 day 1-5 , Bleomycin 7mg day 1-5 , Mitomycin 7mg/m2 day 5 , Vincristine 0.7mg/m2 day every 21 day 2-4 cycle follow radical hysterectomy radical hysterectomy alone . The primary endpoint overall survival secondary endpoint progression-free survival , complication surgery , completeness radical hysterectomy , omission postsurgical irradiation , completeness postsurgical irradiation , response rate , adverse event . A total 200 patient ( 100 per treatment arm ) plan accrue study within 5.5 year .
